title: Cecilia Vicuña: ‘Democracy allowed a teenager like me to be free. When that was removed, it was like the end of the world’
description: The renowned Chilean artist, whose first Irish solo show is at Imma, on the inspiration for her work
content: It was 1973, and Cecilia Vicuña was in London, on a scholarship at Slade School of Fine Art, when the news broke. A CIA-backed military coup had overthrown the government in her native Chile, ousting… [+11556 chars]
